mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MO_ACCOMMODATION (ACMD_UID, USER_ID, ACMD_NAME, ACMD_DESC, IMG_URL, ACMD_ADDR, ACMD_ALTD, ACMD_LGTD, DIRECTION, CITY_NO, CRC_NATION_CD, CRC_UNIT, CANCEL_PLCY_UID, ACTIVE_YN, CREATE_DTTM, UPDATE_DTTM) VALUES (#{acmdUid}, #{userId}, #{acmdName}, #{acmdDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acmdAddr}, #{acmdAltd}, #{acmdLgtd}, #{direction}, #{cityNo}, #{crcNationCd}, #{crcUnit}, #{cancelPlcyUid}, #{activeYn}, #{createDttm}, #{updateDttm})
mapper.select: SELECT ACMD_UID as acmdUid , ACMD_NAME as acmdName , ACMD_DESC as acmdDesc , EMAIL as email , CONTACT as contact , IMG_URL as imgUrl , ACMD_ADDR as acmdAddr , ACMD_ALTD as acmdAltd , ACMD_LGTD as acmdLgtd , DIRECTION as direction , ACMD_AVG_SCORE as acmdAvgScore , CITY_UID as cityUid , CRC_NATION_CD as crcNationCd , CANCEL_PLCY_UID as cancelPlcyUid FROM MO_ACCOMMODATION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT ACMD_UID as acmdUid , ACMD_NAME as acmdName , ACMD_DESC as acmdDesc , EMAIL as email , CONTACT as contact , IMG_URL as imgUrl , ACMD_ADDR as acmdAddr , ACMD_ALTD as acmdAltd , ACMD_LGTD as acmdLgtd , DIRECTION as direction , ACMD_AVG_SCORE as acmdAvgScore , CITY_UID as cityUid , CRC_NATION_CD as crcNationCd , CANCEL_PLCY_UID as cancelPlcyUid FROM MO_ACCOMMODATION WHERE ACMD_UID = #{acmdUid}
